sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词或词组均含有"拜访，访问"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: call on, see, visit, drop in
means: call on ： 社交上的正式用语，指无目的、礼节性的短暂拜访，访问者与被访问者之间一般只有社交或公务关系。
see ： 常用词，含义广泛，既可指接受他人来访，又可指去访问他人。
visit ： 正式用词，强调出于工作需要的访问，也指亲戚朋友间的看望。
drop in ： 多指在计划之外或事先未打招呼的偶然、顺便访问。也可指参观。
watch ： 指用眼睛跟随某物，以便对每一个变化、运动等进行观察。
observe ： 侧重以客观的态度进行观察。
witness ： 指当场看见，亲眼看见。

sentence.Network_en: Specialists see various reasons for the recent surge in inflation.
sentence.Network_cn: 专家们认为目前通货膨胀加剧有多种原因。

sentence.Network_en: I don't see the point in it really. It's just stupid.
sentence.Network_cn: 我真的不理解这到底有什么意义，简直是愚蠢透顶。

sentence.Network_en: He'd phoned Laura to see if she was better.
sentence.Network_cn: 他打电话给劳拉看她是不是好些了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 人教版七年级上册英语单词表 ... our pron. 我们的 see v. 看见 yourself pron. 你自己（反身代词）.
新概念英语第一册单词表_百度文库 ... goodbye( 再见) 9、 see( 见) 10、 fat( 胖的) 11、.
写出下列动词的中文和过去式_百度知道 ... 4． 做 does 5．看 sees 6．来 comes.

list.abs: 广州鹭珂鸶(LOOKSEE)服饰有限公司就是其中的佼佼者。他们赋予源于台湾的鹭珂鸶品牌“高瞻远瞩 ”的涵义，延续了台湾高山族的内 …
介词短语_百度百科 ... run over 略读，略述；辗过，浏览，匆匆复习 see off 给 …… 送行 see through 看穿，识破；干完，干到底.
网络用语大全 ... btw：by the way， 顺便说一句 cu：see you， 再见 yw：yangwei， 不举.
英文商务邮件开场白&amp;结尾 ... no response necessary 无需答复 oh,I see 哦，我明白了 on the other hand 另一方面.

phrase.cizu_name: as far as I can see

jx.jx_en_mean: to the best of my understanding or belief
another way of saying see you
have declined from former prosperity or good condition

lj.lj_ly: this part of South London has seen better days.
lj.lj_ls: 南伦敦的这一片已经不如往昔了。

jx.jx_en_mean: be very worldly or very familiar with a particular situation
said as an appeal for time to think before speaking

lj.lj_ly: Let me see, how old is he now?.
lj.lj_ls: 让我看看，他现在多大年纪？。

phrase.cizu_name: see a man about a dog

jx.jx_en_mean: (humorous)said euphemistically when leaving to go to the toilet or keep an undisclosed appointment
jx.jx_cn_mean: (幽默，婉)有点儿急事先行告辞

phrase.cizu_name: see eye to eye, see fit

jx.jx_en_mean: said to give emphasis to a statement or command or to express a protest
jx.jx_cn_mean: ［用以强调某一陈述，命令，或表示抗议］看看；瞧瞧，听着

lj.lj_ly: now see here, you're going to get it back for me!.
lj.lj_ls: 听着，你要把它给我弄回来！。

phrase.cizu_name: see one's way clear to do (或doing) something

jx.jx_en_mean: find that it is possible or convenient to do something (often used in polite requests)
jx.jx_cn_mean: 有可能做某事；方便做某事（常用于礼貌请求中）

jx.jx_en_mean: recognize a person who can be fooled or deceived
foresee or be prepared for an event, typically an unpleasant one
jx.jx_cn_mean: 预见某事快要发生，准备应对某事（尤指坏事）

jx.jx_en_mean: (Brit. informal)said when refusing categorically and with hostility to do what a person wants
jx.jx_cn_mean: (英, 非正式)［用于恶意的断然拒绝］看某人先倒霉，绝不

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English sēon, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch zien and German sehen, perhaps from an Indo-European root shared by Latin sequi 'follow'
Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French sed, from Latin sedes 'seat', from sedere 'sit'

entry.def: When you see something, you notice it using your eyes.

example.ex: You can't see colours at night...
example.tran: 晚上看不见颜色。

example.ex: I saw a man making his way towards me...
example.tran: 我看到一名男子向我走来。

entry.def: If you see someone, you visit them or meet them.

example.ex: I saw him yesterday...
example.tran: 我昨天见到他了。

example.ex: Mick wants to see you in his office right away...
example.tran: 米克要你马上去他的办公室见他。

entry.def: If you see an entertainment such as a play, film, concert, or sports game, you watch it.

example.ex: He had been to see a Semi-Final of the FA Cup...
example.tran: 他看过一场足总杯半决赛。

example.ex: It was one of the most amazing films I've ever seen.
example.tran: 这是我看过的最精彩的电影之一。

entry.def: If you see that something is true or exists, you realize by observing it that it is true or exists.

example.ex: I could see she was lonely.
example.tran: 我能看出她很寂寞。

example.ex: ...a lot of people saw what was happening but did nothing about it...
example.tran: 很多人都看出发生了什么事却袖手旁观。

entry.def: If you see what someone means or see why something happened, you understand what they mean or understand why it happened.

example.ex: Oh, I see what you're saying...
example.tran: 哦，我明白你的意思了。

example.ex: I don't see why you're complaining...
example.tran: 我不明白你有什么可抱怨的。

entry.def: If you see someone or something as a certain thing, you have the opinion that they are that thing.

example.ex: She saw him as a visionary, but her father saw him as a man who couldn't make a living...
example.tran: 她认为他是一个有眼光的人，但是她父亲却认为他没有谋生的能力。

example.ex: They have a normal body weight but see themselves as being fat...
example.tran: 他们体重正常，但自认为偏胖。

entry.tran: 看出;看上，欣赏(某种特质)
entry.def: If you see a particular quality in someone, you believe they have that quality. If you ask what someone sees in a particular person or thing, you want to know what they find attractive about that person or thing.

example.ex: Frankly, I don't know what Paul sees in her...
example.tran: 坦白地说，我不知道保罗看上她什么了。

example.ex: Young and old saw in him an implacable opponent of apartheid.
example.tran: 无论老少都看出他是种族隔离制度的坚决反对者。

entry.def: If you see something happening in the future, you imagine it, or predict that it will happen.

example.ex: A good idea, but can you see Taylor trying it?...
example.tran: 主意不错，不过你认为泰勒会尝试它吗？

example.ex: We can see a day where all people live side by side.
example.tran: 我们可以想象有那么一天所有人都和睦地生活在一起。

entry.def: If a period of time or a person sees a particular change or event, it takes place during that period of time or while that person is alive.

example.ex: Yesterday saw the resignation of the acting Interior Minister...
example.tran: 昨天代理内政部长辞职了。

example.ex: He had worked with the General for three years and was sorry to see him go...
example.tran: 他与将军共事了 3 年，看他离去觉得很难过。

entry.def: You can use see in expressions to do with finding out information. For example, if you say 'I'll see what's happening', you mean that you intend to find out what is happening.

example.ex: Let me just see what the next song is...
example.tran: 我来看看下一首歌是什么。

example.ex: Every time we asked our mother, she said, 'Well, see what your father says.'...
example.tran: 每次我们问母亲，她总是说：“噢，看你爸爸怎么说。”

entry.def: You can use see to promise to try and help someone. For example, if you say 'I'll see if I can do it', you mean that you will try to do the thing concerned.

example.ex: I'll see if I can call her for you...
example.tran: 我会尽力帮你把她叫来。

example.ex: We'll see what we can do, miss.
example.tran: 我们会尽量想办法，小姐。

entry.def: If you see that something is done or if you see to it that it is done, you make sure that it is done.

example.ex: See that you take care of him...
example.tran: 一定要照顾好他。

example.ex: Catherine saw to it that the information went directly to Walter.
example.tran: 凯瑟琳确保这条消息直接传达给了沃尔特。

entry.def: If you see someone to a particular place, you accompany them to make sure that they get there safely, or to show politeness.

example.ex: He didn't offer to see her to her car...
example.tran: 他没有提出要陪她去取车。

example.ex: 'Goodnight.' — 'I'll see you out.'
example.tran: “晚安。”——“我送你出去。”

entry.def: If you see a lot of someone, you often meet each other or visit each other.

example.ex: We used to see quite a lot of his wife, Carolyn...
example.tran: 我们以前经常见到他的妻子卡罗琳。

example.ex: We didn't see much of each other after that because he was touring.
example.tran: 从那之后我们没怎么见过面，因为他去旅行了。

entry.def: If you are seeing someone, you spend time with them socially, and are having a romantic or sexual relationship.

example.ex: My husband was still seeing her and he was having an affair with her.
example.tran: 我的丈夫仍在和她来往，而且两人还搞婚外情。

entry.def: Some writers use see in expressions such as we saw and as we have seen to refer to something that has already been explained or described.

example.ex: We saw in Chapter 16 how annual cash budgets are produced...
example.tran: 在第 16 章我们了解了年度现金预算是怎样制订的。

example.ex: Using the figures given above, it can be seen that machine A pays back the initial investment in two years...
example.tran: 从以上的数字我们可以看出，机器A在两年后就收回了最初的投资。

entry.def: See is used in books to indicate to readers that they should look at another part of the book, or at another book, because more information is given there.

example.ex: Surveys consistently find that men report feeling safe on the street after dark. See, for example, Hindelang and Garofalo (1978)...
example.tran: 多项调查一致显示，男性认为天黑后在大街上行走是安全的。比如，参见欣德朗和加罗法洛(1978)。

example.ex: See Chapter 7 below for further comments on the textile industry.
example.tran: 有关纺织业的更多评论请参看下面第 7 章。

entry.def: You can use seeing that or seeing as to introduce a reason for what you are saying.

example.ex: He is in the marriage bureau business, which is mildly ironic seeing that his dearest wish is to get married himself...
example.tran: 他从事婚姻介绍工作，这多少有点讽刺意味，因为他最大的愿望就是自己能结婚。

example.ex: Seeing as Mr Moreton is a doctor, I would assume he has a modicum of intelligence.
example.tran: 既然莫尔顿先生是位医生，我想他应该有点聪明才智。

entry.def: You can say 'I see' to indicate that you understand what someone is telling you.

example.ex: 'He came home in my car.' — 'I see.'
example.tran: “他坐我的车回家来的。”——“哦，是这样。”

entry.tran: (表示暂不作决定)看看吧，再说吧
entry.def: People say 'I'll see' or 'We'll see' to indicate that they do not intend to make a decision immediately, and will decide later.

example.ex: We'll see. It's a possibility.
example.tran: 再说吧，可能会的。

entry.tran: (表示试图记起某事或找到某物)让我想一想，让我看看
entry.def: People say 'let me see' or 'let's see' when they are trying to remember something, or are trying to find something.

example.ex: Let's see, they're six — no, make that five hours ahead of us...
example.tran: 让我想一想，他们比我们早 6 个——不，就算是早 5 个小时完成。

example.ex: Now let me see, who's the man we want?
example.tran: 现在让我看一看，谁是我们要找的人？

entry.def: If you try to make someone see sense or see reason, you try to make them realize that they are wrong or are being stupid.

example.ex: He was hopeful that by sitting together they could both see sense and live as good neighbours...
example.tran: 他希望他们坐到一起，彼此能清醒理智，和睦为邻。

example.ex: He tried again to get her to see reason.
example.tran: 他再次试图让她明白自己错了。

entry.tran: (用于向某人解释某事物并鼓励其倾听和理解)你瞧，你知道，看吧
entry.def: You can say 'you see' when you are explaining something to someone, to encourage them to listen and understand.

example.ex: Well, you see, you shouldn't really feel that way about it...
example.tran: 好了，知道吗，对那件事你真的不应该那么想。

example.ex: She was a prime target for blackmail, don't you see?
example.tran: 她是敲诈的主要目标。你难道看不出来吗？

entry.def: 'See you', 'be seeing you', and 'see you later' are ways of saying goodbye to someone when you expect to meet them again soon.

example.ex: 'Talk to you later.' — 'All right. See you love.'
example.tran: “ 回头再跟你谈。”——“好的。再见，亲爱的。”

example.ex: 'No time for chattering now.' — 'Be seeing you, then.'
example.tran: “现在没空闲聊。”——“那么回见。”

entry.tran: 到时候你就知道了;你等着瞧吧
entry.def: You can say 'You'll see' to someone if they do not agree with you about what you think will happen in the future, and you believe that you will be proved right.

example.ex: The thrill wears off after a few years of marriage. You'll see.
example.tran: 婚后几年这种兴奋感就会逐渐消逝。你等着瞧吧。

means.word_mean: 1. the seat within a bishop's diocese where his cathedral is located
1. perceive by sight or have the power to perceive by sight;

sentences.sentence: "You have to be a good observer to see all the details"
"Can you see the bird in that tree?"

means.word_mean: 2. perceive (an idea or situation) mentally;

sentences.sentence: "Does she realize how important this decision is?"

means.word_mean: 3. perceive or be contemporaneous with;

sentences.sentence: "You'll see a lot of cheating in this school"
"The 1960 saw the rebellion of the younger generation against established traditions"

means.word_mean: 4. imagine; conceive of; see in one's mind;

sentences.sentence: "I can see a risk in this strategy"

means.word_mean: 5. deem to be;

sentences.sentence: "She views this quite differently from me"
"I don't see the situation quite as negatively as you do"

means.word_mean: 6. get to know or become aware of, usually accidentally;

sentences.sentence: "I learned that she has two grown-up children"
"I see that you have been promoted"

means.word_mean: 7. see or watch;

sentences.sentence: "This program will be seen all over the world"

means.word_mean: 8. find out, learn, or determine with certainty, usually by making an inquiry or other effort;

sentences.sentence: "I want to see whether she speaks French"
"Check whether the train leaves on time"

means.word_mean: 9. come together;

sentences.sentence: "I'll probably see you at the meeting"

means.word_mean: 10. be careful or certain to do something; make certain of something;

sentences.sentence: "He verified that the valves were closed"

means.word_mean: 11. go to see for professional or business reasons;
12. go to see for a social visit;

sentences.sentence: "I went to see my friend Mary the other day"

means.word_mean: 13. visit a place, as for entertainment;

sentences.sentence: "We went to see the Eiffel Tower in the morning"

means.word_mean: 14. take charge of or deal with;
15. receive as a specified guest;

sentences.sentence: "The minister doesn't see anybody before noon"

means.word_mean: 16. date regularly; have a steady relationship with;

sentences.sentence: "Did you know that she is seeing an older man?"
"He is dating his former wife again!"

means.word_mean: 17. see and understand, have a good eye;

sentences.sentence: "The artist must first learn to see"

means.word_mean: 18. deliberate or decide;

sentences.sentence: "let's see--which movie should we see tonight?"

means.word_mean: 19. observe as if with an eye;

sentences.sentence: "The camera saw the burglary and recorded it"

means.word_mean: 20. observe, check out, and look over carefully or inspect;

sentences.sentence: "I must see your passport before you can enter the country"

means.word_mean: 21. go or live through;

sentences.sentence: "We had many trials to go through"

means.word_mean: 22. accompany or escort;
23. match or meet;

sentences.sentence: "I saw the bet of one of my fellow players"

means.word_mean: 24. make sense of; assign a meaning to;

sentences.sentence: "What message do you see in this letter?"

means.word_mean: 1. compare (used in texts to point the reader to another location in the text)

example.en: Take a look-see at this one and see if you like it.
example.zh: 你瞧一瞧这个，看看喜不喜欢。

example.en: I took a long look-see through my binoculars.
example.zh: 我用望远镜远远地看了一下。

example.en: Long time no see! How are you?

list.explanation: (双方或多方)看法一致，同意某一看法

example.en: Gary and Walter see eye to eye on this question.
example.zh: 加里和沃尔特在这一问题上看法完全一致。

example.en: I cannot see eye to eye with him.

auth_sentence.content: It'll be interesting to see how he responds.
auth_sentence.res_content: It'll be interesting to see how he responds.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It'll be interesting to see how he responds.

auth_sentence.content: 'See the ability not the disability' my bottom.
auth_sentence.res_content: 'See the ability not the disability' my bottom.

stems_affixes.word_buile: see眼光；观察，看→v.看, 看见, 了解

abbreviation.mean_cn: 阻止一切的环境保护论者

means.word_mean: 看见; 观看, 参见,  看得见, 看, 有视力

sentences.en: It's so dark; I can't see.
sentences.cn: 这么黑, 我看不见。

sentences.en: I looked but saw nobody.
sentences.cn: 我看了一下, 但没有看见任何人。

sentences.en: They saw the job had been done.
sentences.cn: 他们看到工作已经做了。

sentences.en: I am delighted to see all so happy.
sentences.cn: 看见大家这么快乐我很高兴。

sentences.en: I saw her face go pale.
sentences.cn: 我看见她的脸变苍白了。

sentences.en: I saw her lying there.
sentences.cn: 我看见她躺在那儿。

means.word_mean: 领会, 理解

sentences.en: I see, you are on leave.
sentences.cn: 我明白了, 你是在休假。

sentences.en: Can you see my point?
sentences.cn: 你能明白我的观点吗?

sentences.en: We don't see where to get assistance.
sentences.cn: 我们不知道到何处求助。

means.word_mean: 考虑; 想想

sentences.en: Let me see, what date are they leaving?
sentences.cn: 让我想想, 他们是什么时候动身的?

sentences.en: I saw the box as empty.
sentences.cn: 我想这盒子是空的。

sentences.en: I don't see (it) good to tell you all my plans.
sentences.cn: 我认为把我的计划都告诉你是不合适的。

means.word_mean: 访问; 会见, 遇见,  碰到, 邂逅

sentences.en: I'm glad to see you.
sentences.cn: 遇到你很高兴。

sentences.en: I will come and see if it is true.
sentences.cn: 我要来了解一下, 是否真有其事。

means.word_mean: 陪伴, 护送

sentences.en: Let's go and see a good picture.
sentences.cn: 让我们去看部好电影。

means.word_mean: 判定；把…看做…(as)

sentences.en: Martin Luther King was seen as a hero of democratic movement.
sentences.cn: 马丁路德金被认为是民主运动的英雄。

means.word_mean: 接见，会见；接待，与…会面

sentences.en: Finally he was seen by the ambassador.
sentences.cn: 最后，大使接见了他。

means.word_mean: 喜欢，看中；追求

sentences.en: What do you see in her?
sentences.cn: 你看中她什么了?

means.word_mean: 同情，鼓励；帮助，资助

sentences.en: You're being seen through college by me!
sentences.cn: 你一直靠了我的资助念完大学!

means.word_mean: 搞清楚，查明

sentences.en: Go to see for yourself!
sentences.cn: 你自己查查去!

jushi.english: Let me see, maybe we will be free Saturday morning.
jushi.chinese: 让我想想,或许星期六早上我们会有空。

jushi.english: She sees no further than her nose.
jushi.chinese: 她只看到鼻子底下这一点。

jushi.english: I can hardly see without my glasses.
jushi.chinese: 我不戴眼镜几乎什么也看不见。
